test_command_all_permissions: Everything is in order to work!
test_command_missing_permissions: Missing permissions. I can't do my job correctly 😔; Remember, in private channels I need a Role with the necessary permissions to function!
test_command_instructions_value:
Use the /work on|off command to change the 'Working here' status.
Use the /replybots on|off command to change how bots are handled.
test_error_permission_user: Could not get the bot user.
test_command_rolemojis_description: Remember 'Manage Roles' is not a default permission.
command_permission_error: You do not have permission to use this command.
field_add_api_value: Can only be enabled or disabled.
test_command_invalid_mode: Invalid mode, check the command inputs.
command_error: An error occurred while executing the command.
